articles.author: Toofab Staff
articles.title: Influencer Who Snatched Baby Wombat From Its Mother Issues Apology Amid Outrage - TooFab
articles.description: Influencer Sam Jones -- who sparked backlash after she stole a baby wombat from its mother in Australia -- addressed the criticism in a two-part statement posted on her Instagram.
articles.content:
An influencer who received widespread criticism after she stole a baby wombat from its mother in Australia has broken her silence.
The social media influencer, Sam Jones, addressed the controversy i… [+6116 chars]
